term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - mass spectrometric detector in gas chromatography
term.title: mass spectrometric detector

item.text: A mass spectrometer used as a detector to give qualitative and quantitative data on the various eluted substances. The mass spectrum of the eluted compounds provides evidence beyond the elution time as to the chemical nature of the species.
